review: Just started checking it out so far I like what I see
author: Eugene Westland

review: It's a very good option for my yupptv app and it's awesome for prime customers but only one thing is we need to another remote to play games and sometimes getting slow or struck prime videos. No apps to watch live cricket streaming.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Bought this today, to use on the bedroom TV... I have been a Roku user for many years now.  I will say I prefer this over the Roku.  I now need to buy another one for the living room.
author: Ernest Murray

review: Easy to install & easy to use. Some great choices for viewing.
author: HelgaK "Helga K"

review: Almost perfect for easy way to access apps on the tv. would have given 5 stars if the remote was a little better though out. Keys could be better marked and back lit.
author: Topcat

review: Won't ship to APO which is complete BULLS***, Volunteering to protect my country and my rights & I got a big spit in the eye from amazon, telling me to F*** off, we won't ship to you.
